jade.tools.ascml.exceptions
Class ModelException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          jade.tools.ascml.exceptions.ASCMLException
              jade.tools.ascml.exceptions.ModelException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ModelException
extends ASCMLException

This class contains methods for setting and getting errors and warnings that might occur during the creation of a model-object.

See Also:
